input_text:
Job Title: Photo Retoucher/ Editor

Location: Deerfield, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Our client, a leading global consumer goods company, is looking for a Photo Retoucher/ Editor to join their team for a long-term freelance project.

The role will be onsite at their studio in South Deerfield, MA. This role is expected to be 40 hours per week, starting in May or June 2024, lasting roughly 11 months.

The freelance eCommerce Photo Retoucher/Editor will be responsible for retouching product photography and still shots that is shot at the client's in-house studio. Retouched photos will be used across social, email, web and retailer sites (Amazon, Target, Walmart, etc.).

The Ideal Candidate Will Have

3+ years of experience, must have experience retouching for an eComm environment including lifestyle, product, glass, food etc. Must have before/after images reflected in portfolio Be a self-starter who is a collaborative, detail-oriented and enthusiastic team playerAbility to work in a fast-paced, high volume environment

Benefits

Creative Circle's Freelance Employee benefits package includes eligibility for Minimum Essential Coverage (MEC) medical plan, dental/vision/term life package, discount prescription program, critical illness, accident, tele-behavioral health, and 401(k) plan. Sick leave is provided to Candidates whose assignment work location is in a state or city subject to sick leave laws. A Minimum Value (MV) PPO medical plan, Employee Stock Purchase Plan, and paid holiday eligibility are based on length and dates of service.

Email Your Resume In Word To

Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:

bcarter@creativecircle.com

Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : WC3-1798224 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***

Billy Carter - Recruiter, National Delivery - CyberCoders

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

CreativeCircle is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, genetic information, registered domestic partner status, marital status, status as a crime victim, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. CreativeCircle will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable law. CreativeCircle is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodation to individuals with physical and mental disabilities. If you need special assistance or an accommodation while seeking employment, please contact a member of our Human Resources team to make arrangements.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.summary: Leading global consumer goods company seeks a Photo Retoucher/ Editor for a long-term freelance project.

Sick leave is provided, and certain benefits are based on length and dates of service.
